headline: Oilfield Services Expand to Data Center Services As AI Booms
summary: Oilfield service companies like Schlumberger and Halliburton are leveraging their expertise to enter the data center market, focusing on digital solutions and distributed power to meet the demands of the AI boom.

raw.headline: Oilfield Services Expand to Data Center Services As AI Booms
raw.summary: Oilfield service companies like Schlumberger and Halliburton are leveraging their expertise to enter the data center market, focusing on digital solutions and distributed power to meet the demands of the AI boom.

headline: Expand Energy Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Miss, Both Rise Y/Y
summary: EXE posts a Q3 earnings beat on surging production and higher natural gas prices, though revenues lag estimates.

raw.headline: Expand Energy Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Miss, Both Rise Y/Y
raw.summary: EXE posts a Q3 earnings beat on surging production and higher natural gas prices, though revenues lag estimates.

headline: Nabors Q3 Loss Wider Than Expected, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: NBR posts a wider-than-expected Q3 loss despite higher revenues, as weakness in U.S. Drilling and Rig Technologies weighs on results.

raw.headline: Nabors Q3 Loss Wider Than Expected, Revenues Increase Y/Y
raw.summary: NBR posts a wider-than-expected Q3 loss despite higher revenues, as weakness in U.S. Drilling and Rig Technologies weighs on results.

headline: ProPetro Holding's Q3 Loss Narrower Than Expected, Sales Beat
summary: PUMP projects full-year capital expenditures for 2025 to be between $270 million and $290 million.

raw.headline: ProPetro Holding's Q3 Loss Narrower Than Expected, Sales Beat
raw.summary: PUMP projects full-year capital expenditures for 2025 to be between $270 million and $290 million.

headline: Magnolia Oil & Gas Q3 Earnings Match Estimates, Revenues Beat
summary: MGY expects fourth-quarter 2025 D&C capital spending of about $110 million, bringing full-year capex close to the midpoint of its $430-$470 million guidance.

raw.headline: Magnolia Oil & Gas Q3 Earnings Match Estimates, Revenues Beat
raw.summary: MGY expects fourth-quarter 2025 D&C capital spending of about $110 million, bringing full-year capex close to the midpoint of its $430-$470 million guidance.

headline: Why The Narrative Around Halliburton Is Shifting Amid Analyst Upgrades and Strategic Moves
summary: Halliburton stock has attracted fresh attention following a notable boost in its consensus analyst price target, which has climbed from $27.04 to $29.46. This upward revision signals a more optimistic outlook as analysts respond favorably to the company's robust quarterly performance and positive financial guidance. Stay tuned to discover how you can keep informed as expectations and narratives surrounding Halliburton continue to evolve. Analyst Price Targets don't always capture the full...
